identity.title: Face ID mismatch
steps: Make sure that you are in a well-lit area with no shadows on your face
Position yourself so that your face is centered in the frame. with no other face in the frame
Remove any hats, glasses, or other items that may obscure your face
Look directly at the camera and try to maintain a neutral expression
Hold still for a few seconds while the system captures your image
Check the preview to make sure that your face is clearly visible and in focus
Click on the "Submit"  button to complete the verificationÂ process
